message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a smaller share, but I'm still willing to compromise.
I'll give you a larger share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I'll try to squeeze out a decent share.
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. I'll give you most of it, but I'm not going down without a fight!
I'm not budging, Alice. You'll have to make a better offer if you want any of this money.
I'm not getting any more generous, Bob. You're getting most of it, but I'm not walking away with nothing!
You're not getting any more of my money, Alice. This is my final offer.
